extensionDescription.message: Store your own coupons/voucher codes for websites. No external offers are used, just your promotional codes that you have registered. A notification appears on the sites to remind you that you have a code to use (for example a refund, a gift code received in a newsletter, etc.).

intro_access.message: It's mandatory to give access to all websites to have this addon to work:

import_export_text.message: It's possible to export/import all coupons:

import_intro.message: Select the JSON that will be used to remplace the existing data:

import_confirm.message: The coupons have been imported. You can close this page.
